text:
Cruise - San Francisco, CA | Onsite | Full Time | VISA

Driverless cars. In less than a year, we built prototype vehicles that have logged over 10,000 autonomous miles on California highways.

We're currently 22 people, almost all engineers. Really smart team with some PhDs, MSs, etc. who have done this type of stuff for years. Also fun to hang out with and all that jazz =).

Looking for a variety of roles, including robotics experts, backend engineers, an iOS engineer, and a lead firmware engineer. See https://jobs.lever.co/cruise

Keywords: C++, ROS, OpenCV, iOS, robotics.
